prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a gentle sea creature with smooth curves.
I want a cute ice-type Pokemon with a playful demeanor and flipper-like limbs.
Generate an aquatic Pokemon with a sleek body and a friendly expression, perfect for underwater adventures.
Make a design for a Pokemon that has a round body and icy blue colors, evoking a sense of calm.
Imagine a water and ice-type Pokemon that has a serene personality and glides gracefully through the water.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of winter, with a soft, white coat and cheerful features.
Design a playful seal-like Pokemon that enjoys swimming and playing in the ocean waves.
